A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no idea how\, as a fan of previous Star War movies\, you wouldn't like this Star War. It does all kinds of Star War stuff from front to back. The characters are great\, and the action completely revolves around their decisions and their arcs\, the battles are spectacular\, the visuals are stunning\, the production design is excellent\, and the porgs are cute\, dammit. Loved it\, can't wait to see how this story finishes!
